messages.text: Introduce yourself.
Hi, my name is Paul.
I'm a graduate student at UIUC studying Computer Science.
I completed my undergrad at Oregon State University with a 3.8 GPA.
I'm currently involved with CodePath and multiple developer clubs at OSU.
What are your technical skills?
I'm comfortable with Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Java.
I work with React, NestJS, NextJS, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Docker, and AWS.
What kind of work have you done?
At NASA, I built a dashboard for exercise analytics and a Django backend for 10+ years of data.
At Lucid Motors, I maintained supplier tools, added new features, and built test automation.
At Summersalt, I migrated jQuery to React, improved performance, and implemented CI/CD pipelines.
What side projects have you worked on?
I created PromptMail, an AI-integrated email summarizer with secure backend APIs.
I also built BeavsHub, a React app for course reviews, with animated UI and robust testing.
What are your hobbies?
I love running and exploring new coffee shops.
I also enjoy cooking, listening to live music, and playing board games with friends.
Above all, I love building cool things that make peopleâ€™s lives easier and more fun!
How can I reach you?
You can also find my contact info by clicking the '+' button in the bottom right corner of the chat.
Feel free to ask me anything!

suggestedQuestions: What are your strengths as an engineer?
Which tech stacks are you most experienced with?
